content:
This seems like a potential backwards-compatibility issue: https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/83452

I vaguely recall a similar issue, but can't find it right now

@Jonas Schievink [he/him] It was here in https://rust-lang.zulipchat.com/#narrow/stream/146212-t-compiler.2Fconst-eval/topic/Bounds.20on.20non-type-parameters.20work.2C.20is.20that.20on.20purpose.3F/near/222214631
